typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UploadedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingcustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingadd
cloudstreamingcustomer, cloudstreamingadd join(cloudstreamingcustomer@CustomerId == cloudstreamingadd@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> streamingjoin
streamingjoin select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId = cloudstreamingcustomer@CustomerId,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDateCustomer = cloudstreamingcustomer@CreatedDate,
		UploadedDateCustomer = UploadedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDateAddress = cloudstreamingadd@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDateAddress = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(CreatedDate = iif(greater(CreatedDateCustomer,CreatedDateAddress),CreatedDateCustomer,CreatedDateAddress),
		UpdatedDate = iif(greater(UploadedDateCustomer, UpdatedDateAddress), UploadedDateCustomer,UpdatedDateAddress)) ~> dateDerivedColumn
dateDerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	)) ~> finaldata
finaldata sink(input(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['customerstreaming.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> customerstreamingsink
